nodes.comandosqlorigendash01: select * from (SELECT nombrecolumna, sum(Valoramount::int) as total  FROM banwiredash02graph01  where graphnbr='1' group by nombrecolumna) a order by a.total desc;
nodes.comandosqlorigendash02: select * from (SELECT nombrecolumna, sum(Valoramount::int) as total  FROM banwiredash02graph01  where graphnbr='1' group by nombrecolumna) a order by a.total desc;
nodes.comandosqlorigendash03: select * from (select  b.usuario as nombrecolumna, sum(a.monto) as Valoramount from transaccion a, transaccion_estado g, usuario b where a.fecha BETWEEN DATE('2019-08-05') AND DATE('2019-08-06') and g.id = a.estado_id and g.nombre = 'Pagada' and a.usuario_id = b.id_usuario group by b.usuario) a order by a.Valoramount desc;
nodes.comandosqlorigendash04: select * from (SELECT nombrecolumna, sum(Valoramount::int) as total  FROM banwiredash02graph01  where graphnbr='1' group by nombrecolumna) a order by a.total desc;

nodes.comandosqlorigendash06: select * from (SELECT nombrecolumna, sum(Valoramount::int) as total  FROM banwiredash02graph01  where graphnbr='1' group by nombrecolumna) a order by a.total desc;
nodes.comandosqlorigendash07: select * from (select  b.usuario as nombrecolumna, sum(a.monto) as Valoramount from transaccion a, transaccion_estado g, usuario b where a.fecha BETWEEN DATE('2019-08-05') AND DATE('2019-08-06') and g.id = a.estado_id and g.nombre = 'Denegada' and a.usuario_id = b.id_usuario group by b.usuario) a order by a.Valoramount desc;
